00103 void WMG::init(const int _N)
00104 {
00105     current_step_number = 0;
00106     gravity = 9.81; // hard-coded
00107 
00108     N = _N;
00109 
00110 
00111     X = new double[SMPC_NUM_VAR*N];
00112 
00113     for(int i=0; i<SMPC_NUM_STATE_VAR; i++)
00114     {
00115         X_tilde[i] = 0.0;
00116     }
00117 
00118     T = new double[N];
00119     h = new double[N];
00120 
00121     angle = new double[N];
00122     zref_x = new double[N];
00123     zref_y = new double[N];
00124     fp_x = new double[N];
00125     fp_y = new double[N];
00126     lb = new double[2*N];
00127     ub = new double[2*N];
00128 
00129 
00130 
00132     def_constraint[0] = 0.09;
00133     def_constraint[1] = 0.025;
00134     def_constraint[2] = 0.03;
00135     def_constraint[3] = 0.025;
00136     def_repeat_times = 4;
00137 
00138     def_ds_constraint[0] = 0.07;
00139     def_ds_constraint[1] = 0.025;
00140     def_ds_constraint[2] = 0.025;
00141     def_ds_constraint[3] = 0.025;
00142     def_ds_num = 0;
00143 }

00153 void WMG::init_param(
00154         const double T_, 
00155         const double hCoM_,
00156         const double step_height_)
00157 {
00158     hCoM = hCoM_;      
00159 
00160     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
00161     {
00162         T[i] = T_;
00163         h[i] = hCoM/gravity;
00164     }
00165 
00166     step_height = step_height_;
00167 }

00184 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00185         const double x_relative, 
00186         const double y_relative, 
00187         const double angle_relative, 
00188         const int n_this, 
00189         const int n, 
00190         const double *d, 
00191         const fs_type type)
00192 {
00193     def_constraint[0] = d[0];
00194     def_constraint[1] = d[1];
00195     def_constraint[2] = d[2];
00196     def_constraint[3] = d[3];
00197     def_repeat_times = n_this;
00198     def_ds_num = n - n_this;
00199     AddFootstep(x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative, type);
00200 }

00227     def_ds_num = n - n_this;
00228     AddFootstep(x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative, type);

00231 
00232 
00245 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00246         const double x_relative, 
00247         const double y_relative, 
00248         const double angle_relative, 
00249         fs_type type)
00250 {
00251     if (FS.size() == 0)
00252     {
00253         // this is the first ("virtual") step.
00254         if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00255         {
00256             type = FS_TYPE_DS;
00257         }
00258 
00259         FS.push_back(
00260                 FootStep(
00261                     angle_relative, 
00262                     x_relative,
00263                     y_relative, 
00264                     def_repeat_times, 
00265                     type,
00266                     def_constraint));
00267     }
00268     else
00269     {
00270         // Angle and position of the previous step
00271         double prev_a = FS.back().angle;
00272         Point2D prev_p(FS.back());        
00273 
00274         // determine type of the step
00275         if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00276         {
00277             switch (FS.back().type)
00278             {
00279                 case FS_TYPE_SS_L:
00280                     type = FS_TYPE_SS_R;
00281                     break;
00282                 case FS_TYPE_SS_R:
00283                     type = FS_TYPE_SS_L;
00284                     break;
00285                 case FS_TYPE_DS:
00286                 default:
00287                     type = FS_TYPE_SS_R;
00288                     break;
00289             }
00290         }
00291 
00292         // Position of the next step
00293         Point2D next_p(prev_p);        
00294         next_p.x += FS.back().ca*x_relative - FS.back().sa*y_relative;
00295         next_p.y += FS.back().sa*x_relative + FS.back().ca*y_relative;
00296 
00297 
00298         // Add double support constraints that lie between the
00299         // newly added step and the previous step
00300         for (int i = 0; i < def_ds_num; i++)
00301         {
00302             double theta = (double) (i+1)/(def_ds_num + 1);
00303             double ds_a = prev_a + angle_relative * theta;
00304 
00305             FS.push_back(
00306                     FootStep(
00307                         ds_a, 
00308                         (1-theta)*prev_p.x + theta*next_p.x,
00309                         (1-theta)*prev_p.y + theta*next_p.y,
00310                         1, 
00311                         FS_TYPE_DS,
00312                         def_ds_constraint));
00313         }
00314 
00315 
00316         // add the new step
00317         FS.push_back(
00318                 FootStep(
00319                     prev_a + angle_relative, 
00320                     next_p.x, 
00321                     next_p.y, 
00322                     def_repeat_times, 
00323                     type,
00324                     def_constraint));
00325     }    
00326 }

00340 int WMG::getNextSS(const int start_ind, const fs_type type)
00341 {
00342     int index = start_ind + 1;
00343     for (; index < (int) FS.size(); index++) 
00344     {
00345         if (FS[index].type != FS_TYPE_DS)
00346         {
00347             if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00348             {
00349                 break;
00350             }
00351             else
00352             {
00353                 if (FS[index].type == type)
00354                 {
00355                     break;
00356                 }
00357             }
00358         }
00359     }
00360     return (index);
00361 }
00362

00364 
00375 int WMG::getPrevSS(const int start_ind, const fs_type type)
00376 {
00377     int index = start_ind - 1;
00378     for (; index >= 0; index--)
00379     {
00380         if (FS[index].type != FS_TYPE_DS)
00381         {
00382             if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00383             {
00384                 break;
00385             }
00386             else
00387             {
00388                 if (FS[index].type == type)
00389                 {
00390                     break;
00391                 }
00392             }
00393         }
00394     }
00395     return (index);
00396 }

00398 
00399 
00420 fs_type WMG::getSwingFootNextPrevPos (
00421         double *prev_swing_pos,
00422         double *next_swing_pos,
00423         int *repeat_times,
00424         int *repeated_times)
00425 {
00426     fs_type cur_fs_type = FS[current_step_number].type;
00427     int next_swing_ind, prev_swing_ind;
00428     int next_ss_ind, prev_ss_ind;
00429 
00430     switch (cur_fs_type)
00431     {
00432         case FS_TYPE_SS_L:
00433         case FS_TYPE_SS_R:
00434             prev_swing_ind = getPrevSS (
00435                     current_step_number, 
00436                     (current_reference_foot == FS_TYPE_SS_R) ? FS_TYPE_SS_L : FS_TYPE_SS_R);
00437             next_swing_ind = getNextSS (
00438                     current_step_number, 
00439                     (current_reference_foot == FS_TYPE_SS_R) ? FS_TYPE_SS_L : FS_TYPE_SS_R);
00440 
00441             *repeat_times = FS[current_step_number].repeat_times;
00442             *repeated_times = *repeat_times - FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter;
00443             break;
00444 
00445         case FS_TYPE_DS:
00446             next_ss_ind = getNextSS (current_step_number);
00447             prev_ss_ind = getPrevSS (current_step_number);
00448             if (FS[next_ss_ind].type == current_reference_foot)
00449             {
00450                 next_swing_ind = prev_swing_ind = prev_ss_ind;
00451             }
00452             else
00453             {
00454                 next_swing_ind = prev_swing_ind = next_ss_ind;
00455             }
00456 
00457             *repeat_times = 0;
00458             *repeated_times = 0;
00459             break;
00460 
00461         case FS_TYPE_AUTO:
00462         default:
00463             // should never happen, since type is checked when steps are added.
00464             return (cur_fs_type);
00465     }
00466 
00467 
00468     prev_swing_pos[0] = FS[prev_swing_ind].x;
00469     prev_swing_pos[1] = FS[prev_swing_ind].y;
00470     prev_swing_pos[2] = FS[prev_swing_ind].angle;
00471 
00472     next_swing_pos[0] = FS[next_swing_ind].x;
00473     next_swing_pos[1] = FS[next_swing_ind].y;
00474     next_swing_pos[2] = FS[next_swing_ind].angle;
00475 
00476     return (cur_fs_type);
00477 }
00478 
00479 
00480 
00500 void WMG::getSwingFootPosition (
00501         const swing_foot_pos_type swing_type,
00502         const int loops_per_preview_iter,
00503         const int loops_in_current_preview,
00504         double *swing_foot_pos,
00505         double *angle_xy)
00506 {
00507     if (swing_type == WMG_SWING_2D_PARABOLA)
00508     {
00509         int num_iter_in_ss;
00510         int num_iter_in_ss_passed;
00511         double prev_swing_pos[3];
00512         double next_swing_pos[3];
00513 
00514         if (getSwingFootNextPrevPos(
00515                 prev_swing_pos,
00516                 next_swing_pos,
00517                 &num_iter_in_ss,
00518                 &num_iter_in_ss_passed) != FS_TYPE_DS)
00519         {
00520             double theta =
00521                 (double) (loops_per_preview_iter * num_iter_in_ss_passed + loops_in_current_preview) /
00522                 (loops_per_preview_iter * num_iter_in_ss);
00523 
00524             double x[3] = {
00525                 prev_swing_pos[0],
00526                 (prev_swing_pos[0] + next_swing_pos[0])/2,
00527                 next_swing_pos[0]};
00528 
00529             double b_coef = - (x[2]*x[2] - x[0]*x[0])/(x[2] - x[0]);
00530             double a = step_height / (x[1]*x[1] - x[0]*x[0] + b_coef*(x[1] - x[0]));
00531             double b = a * b_coef;
00532             double c = - a*x[0]*x[0] - b*x[0];
00533 
00534             swing_foot_pos[0] = (1-theta)*x[0] + theta*x[2]; // linear equation
00535             swing_foot_pos[1] = next_swing_pos[1];
00536             swing_foot_pos[2] = a * swing_foot_pos[0] * swing_foot_pos[0] + b * swing_foot_pos[0] + c;
00537         }
00538         else
00539         {
00540             swing_foot_pos[0] = next_swing_pos[0];
00541             swing_foot_pos[1] = next_swing_pos[1];
00542             swing_foot_pos[2] = 0.0;
00543         }
00544 
00545         *angle_xy = next_swing_pos[2];
00546     }
00547 }

00550 
00551 
00557 WMGret WMG::FormPreviewWindow()
00558 {
00559     WMGret retval = WMG_OK;
00560     int win_step_num = current_step_number;
00561     int step_repeat_times = FS[win_step_num].repeat_counter;
00562 
00563 
00564     // If reference foot is unknown, this function is executed
00565     // for the first time: we need to use the next SS as the
00566     // reference foot, since the first SS must be fake.
00567     if (current_reference_foot == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00568     {
00569         current_reference_foot = FS[getNextSS (win_step_num)].type;
00570     }
00571 
00572     // Indicate switch of the reference foot
00573     if (    // if we are not in the initial support
00574             (win_step_num != 0) && 
00575             // we are in DS
00576             (FS[win_step_num].type == FS_TYPE_DS) &&
00577             // the previous footstep was not DS
00578             (FS[win_step_num-1].type != FS_TYPE_DS) &&
00579             // this is the first iteration in DS
00580             (FS[win_step_num].repeat_counter == FS[win_step_num].repeat_times))
00581     {
00582         retval = WMG_SWITCH_REFERENCE_FOOT;
00583         current_reference_foot = FS[getNextSS (win_step_num)].type;
00584     }
00585 
00586 
00587     for (int i = 0; i < N;)
00588     {
00589         if (step_repeat_times > 0)
00590         {
00591             angle[i] = FS[win_step_num].angle;
00592 
00593             fp_x[i] = FS[win_step_num].x;
00594             fp_y[i] = FS[win_step_num].y;
00595 
00597             zref_x[i] = FS[win_step_num].x + 0.02*FS[win_step_num].ca;
00598             zref_y[i] = FS[win_step_num].y + 0.02*FS[win_step_num].sa;
00599 
00600             lb[i*2] = -FS[win_step_num].d[2];
00601             ub[i*2] = FS[win_step_num].d[0];
00602 
00603             lb[i*2 + 1] = -FS[win_step_num].d[3];
00604             ub[i*2 + 1] = FS[win_step_num].d[1];
00605 
00606             step_repeat_times--;
00607             i++;
00608         }
00609         else
00610         {
00611             win_step_num++;
00612             if (win_step_num == (int) FS.size())
00613             {
00614                 retval = WMG_HALT;
00615                 break;
00616             }
00617             step_repeat_times = FS[win_step_num].repeat_counter;
00618         }
00619     }
00620 
00621 
00622     if (FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter == 0)
00623     {
00624         current_step_number++;
00625     }
00626 
00627     FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter--;
00628     if (FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter == 0)
00629     {
00630         current_step_number++;
00631     }
00632 
00633     return (retval);
00634 }

00637 
00646 void WMG::initABMatrices (const double sampling_time)
00647 {
00648     A = new double[9];
00649     B = new double[3];
00650 
00651     A[0] = A[4] = A[8] = 1;
00652     A[1] = A[2] = A[5] = 0;
00653     A[3] = A[7] = sampling_time;
00654     A[6] = sampling_time * sampling_time/2 /*- delta_hCoM = 0*/;
00655 
00656     B[0] = sampling_time * sampling_time * sampling_time / 6 - hCoM/gravity * sampling_time;
00657     B[1] = sampling_time * sampling_time/2;
00658     B[2] = sampling_time;
00659 }
00660 
00661 
00662 
00673 void WMG::initState (const double CoM_x, const double CoM_y, double *state)
00674 {
00675     for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00676     {
00677         state[i] = 0;
00678     }
00679 
00680 
00681     double h_tmp  = hCoM/gravity;
00682     // Note that state[2] and state[5] are zeros.
00683     state[0] = CoM_x - h_tmp * state[2]; 
00684     state[3] = CoM_y - h_tmp * state[5];
00685 }
00686 
00687 
00688 
00698 void WMG::calculateNextState (const double *control, double *state)
00699 {
00700     if ((A == NULL) || (B == NULL))
00701     {
00702         return;
00703     }
00704 
00705 
00706     state[0] = state[0] * A[0]
00707              + state[1] * A[3]
00708              + state[2] * A[6]
00709              + control[0] * B[0];
00710 
00711     state[1] = state[1] * A[4]
00712              + state[2] * A[7]
00713              + control[0] * B[1];
00714 
00715     state[2] = state[2] * A[8]
00716              + control[0] * B[2];
00717 
00718     state[3] = state[3] * A[0]
00719              + state[4] * A[3]
00720              + state[5] * A[6]
00721              + control[1] * B[0];
00722 
00723     state[4] = state[4] * A[4]
00724              + state[5] * A[7]
00725              + control[1] * B[1];
00726 
00727     state[5] = state[5] * A[8]
00728              + control[1] * B[2];
00729 }

00739 void WMG::FS2file(const std::string filename)
00740 {
00741     
00742     FILE *file_op = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
00743     
00744     if(!file_op)
00745     {
00746         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot open file (for writing)\n");
00747         return;
00748     }
00749     
00750     fprintf(file_op,"%%\n%% Footsteps generated using the c++ version of the WMG\n%%\n\n");
00751     
00752     int i;
00753     for (i=0; i< (int) FS.size(); i++ )
00754     {
00755         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).a = %f;\nFS(%i).p = [%f;%f];\nFS(%i).d = [%f;%f;%f;%f];\n", 
00756                 i+1, FS[i].angle, 
00757                 i+1, FS[i].x, FS[i].y, 
00758                 i+1, FS[i].d[0], FS[i].d[1], FS[i].d[2], FS[i].d[3]);
00759 
00760         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).D = [%f %f;%f %f;%f %f;%f %f];\n", 
00761                 i+1, FS[i].D[0], FS[i].D[4],
00762                      FS[i].D[1], FS[i].D[5],
00763                      FS[i].D[2], FS[i].D[6],
00764                      FS[i].D[3], FS[i].D[7]); 
00765 
00766         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).v = [%f %f; %f %f; %f %f; %f %f; %f %f];\n", 
00767                 i+1, FS[i].vert[0].x, FS[i].vert[0].y, 
00768                      FS[i].vert[1].x, FS[i].vert[1].y, 
00769                      FS[i].vert[2].x, FS[i].vert[2].y, 
00770                      FS[i].vert[3].x, FS[i].vert[3].y, 
00771                      FS[i].vert[0].x, FS[i].vert[0].y);
00772 
00773         if (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_DS)
00774         {
00775             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).type = 1;\n\n", i+1);
00776         }
00777         if ((FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS_L) || (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS_R))
00778         {
00779             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).type = 2;\n\n", i+1);
00780         }
00781     }
00782 
00783     fprintf(file_op,"hold on\n");    
00784     fprintf(file_op,"for i=1:length(FS)\n");
00785     fprintf(file_op,"    if FS(i).type == 1;\n");
00786     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','r','MarkerSize',2)\n");
00787     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).v(:,1), FS(i).v(:,2), 'c');\n");
00788     fprintf(file_op,"    end\n");
00789     fprintf(file_op,"    if FS(i).type == 2;\n");
00790     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','g','MarkerSize',4)\n");
00791     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).v(:,1), FS(i).v(:,2), 'r');\n");
00792     fprintf(file_op,"    end\n");
00793     fprintf(file_op,"end\n");
00794     fprintf(file_op,"grid on; %%axis equal\n");
00795     fclose(file_op);  
00796 }
